meanings.sent1: The monostelic plant had a unique structure with just one main support system.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the monostelic fern to understand its growth pattern.
meanings.sent3: The monostelic tree decided it was tired of standing alone and asked for a companion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and unyielding as a monostelic pillar.
meanings.sent5: The monostelic characteristic of the flower made it easy to identify in the garden.

meanings.definition: Monostelic: pertaining to a plant with only one primary vascular cylinder
meanings.sent1: The monostelic fern's vascular system efficiently transported nutrients throughout the plant.
meanings.sent2: Gardening enthusiasts admired the beauty of the monostelic flower in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The monostelic shrub joked that it was the 'one and only' in the garden party.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was as focused and essential as a monostelic root.
meanings.sent5: The monostelic nature of the plant made it a fascinating subject for botanical research.
